title: China locks down Shanghai Disneyland and tests 34,000 visitors after single Covid case
content:
1. China locks down Shanghai Disneyland and tests 34,000 visitors after single Covid case  The Guardian
  2. COVID-19 scare forces Shanghai Disney into lockdown after woman tests positive l ABC7  ABC7
  3. Shanghai's Halloween Lockdown Becomes a Disney Nightmare as 30000 Are Detained in Theme Park Virus Scare  The Daily Beast
  4. Shanghai Disneyland is shut down, and 30000 people are tested, after one COVID case  NPR
  5. China Locks 30,000 Visitors Inside Shanghai Disneyland After One Guest Got Covid-19  The Wall Street Journal
contentSnippet:

localize.title: 中国、上海ディズニーランドを封鎖し、34,000人の来場者にコヴィド感染の検査を実施
中国关闭上海迪士尼乐园并对34000名游客进行检测，因为出现了单一的科维德病例
中國關閉上海迪士尼樂園並對34000名遊客進行檢測，因爲出現了單一的科維德病例
